About Me

Nice to meet you! My name is Edmond, a Web Developer currently based in Buffalo, New York. Class of 2018 Graduate from the State University at Buffalo of New York with a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration and Management Information Systems.

The core of my skill set relies heavily upon the MERN stack, to be able to achieve a smooth and dynamic user experience. Currently some of my primary goals are to improve on my JavaScript and ReactJS capabilities. As well as dabble in other frameworks such as AngularJS to expand my tech stack and knowledge. When I'm not doing web development, I enjoy spending time with my lady and doggo, I also love cooking, fitness, video games, anime, geek stuff, learning about the latest technology, etc.

Contact Me

I'm currently available for work and pursuing new opportunities.

If you have a project in mind that you'd like to get started with or have a problem to solve, or just fancy a conversation and a possible chance of coffee ☕, please feel free to connect with me and leave me a message. I will try my best to get back to you as soon as I can!
